General.Name: Young & Co.'s Brewery P.L.C
General.Description: Young & Co.'s Brewery, P.L.C. engages in the operation and management of pubs and hotels in the United Kingdom. It sells drinks and food, as well as provides accommodation services. The company was founded in 1831 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Copper House, London, United Kingdom, SW18 4AQ
